pullRequest.title: Fix issues related to autoUpdate UI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue: #8688 (comment)
Description:

Showcase error text w.r.t. material auto update toggle on the widget

  

The foundation hax styles were applying which caused an additional 1em margin bottom to the radio input.
Rectified that by explicitly setting margin to zero.

nodes.bodyText: Hmm, looking at RadioField, it doesn't seem to render errorText on its own. Should we just add <ErrorText/> to RadioField like all the other input components? Seems like it may have been an oversight in its initial impl?
